scripts.prepush: echo There should be additional layer of checks
scripts.bucket: aws s3api create-bucket --bucket sns-test-bucket-delete --region eu-west-1 --create-bucket-configuration LocationConstraint=eu-west-1
scripts.package: aws cloudformation package --template-file template.yaml --output-template-file build/output.yaml --s3-bucket sns-test-bucket-delete
scripts.deploy: aws cloudformation deploy --template-file build/output.yaml --stack-name sns-example-trigger-lambda-consumer --capabilities CAPABILITY_NAMED_IAM
scripts.qd: npm run folder && npm run package && npm run deploy
